summary.zh: 源于清代的水上宴饮民俗，以船为席，配湖鲜与茶点。
summary.en: A Qing-era waterside banquet tradition served aboard boats, featuring lake delicacies and tea snacks.

background.zh: 船宴随长荡湖水街夜游兴起而再受关注，常与“湖八鲜”组合为主题餐饮与演艺体验。
background.en: With the rise of the Water Street night tour, the Boat Banquet regained popularity, often paired with the 'Eight Lake Delicacies' for themed dining and performances.

sources.title: 央视网《消费主张》：水街点亮长荡湖 湖八鲜船宴

summary.zh: 以鱼形灯为道具的传统舞蹈，发源于金坛指前镇芦家村。
summary.en: A traditional dance using fish-shaped lanterns, originating in Lujia Village, Zhiqian Town, Jintan.

background.zh: 清末碑刻与族谱有记载，历经 120–130 余年传承，现为江苏省级非遗项目，常见于元宵等节庆展演。
background.en: Recorded in late-Qing inscriptions and genealogies; preserved for over 120–130 years and listed as a Jiangsu provincial intangible cultural heritage item.

sources.title: 金坛区官网：非遗·指前鱼灯
常州发布（新华社江苏）：指前鱼灯报道

summary.zh: 在长荡湖畔柚山村举办的水乡节庆活动，已有近两百年传承。
summary.en: A waterside festival in Youshan Village by Changdang Lake, with a tradition spanning nearly two centuries.

background.zh: 放灯节多在七夕前后举行，象征祈愿与祝福，夜间湖畔点灯成景。2009 年“长荡湖柚山放灯节”被列为江苏省级非物质文化遗产代表性项目。近年来活动叠加“爱情地标”等主题，并与乡村旅游、夜经济相结合，形成灯会、展演与市集等综合体验。柚山村结合生态修复打造的“翡翠之心”景观，也成为节庆叙事的重要意象。
background.en: Held around the Qixi season, the ritual symbolizes blessings and hope as lanterns illuminate the lakeshore night. In 2009 it was inscribed as a Jiangsu provincial ICH item. Recent editions blend ‘romance’ themes with rural tourism and night markets, featuring performances and fairs; the ‘Emerald Heart’ landscape, born from ecological restoration, has become an iconic backdrop.

sources.title: 江苏文明网：2022 中国·长荡湖放灯节在金坛柚山村举行（省级非遗、约200年）

summary.zh: 长荡湖代表性水产品牌，已培育为中国农产品区域公用品牌之一。
summary.en: A signature aquatic brand of Changdang Lake, cultivated as a Chinese regional public brand for agricultural products.

background.zh: 常州以品牌建设与故事化传播推动农业品牌体系优化，长荡湖大闸蟹与溧阳青虾等被列为区域公用品牌产品。当地围绕生态养殖、质量追溯与市场拓展开展联动，形成从产地到餐桌的全链条品牌表达。媒体报道显示，蟹业协会等主体推动赛事评优与市场开拓，扩大产区影响力。
background.en: Changzhou has advanced brand building and narrative marketing, with Changdang Lake crabs recognized among regional public agricultural brands. Efforts focus on eco-aquaculture, traceability, and market expansion, articulating a ‘from origin to table’ brand chain. Reports also note associations driving competitions and outreach to broaden the production area’s profile.

sources.title: 新华报业网：常州打造农业品牌（含长荡湖大闸蟹为区域公用品牌）
常观（常州台）：全国名蟹赛事与产区影响力

summary.zh: 以餐船与灯光夜景著称的水上街区，是度假区的核心游线之一。
summary.en: A lakeside water-street famed for boat dining and night lights, serving as a core route in the resort area.

background.zh: 媒体早年报道其“千米水街”与秋季美食属性，使之成为蟹季人气目的地。街区以江南水乡建筑群与亲水步道营造夜游氛围，常与船宴、“湖八鲜”等主题体验结合。作为文旅门面的展示窗口，水街承担“内容+场景”的综合叙事功能，连接餐饮、演艺与节庆活动。
background.en: Earlier reports described a ‘kilometer-long water street’ with seasonal food appeal, making it a hotspot during crab season. Jiangnan-style architecture and waterside promenades create night-tour ambience, often paired with boat banquets and ‘Eight Lake Delicacies’. As a showcase frontage, the street integrates content and scene, connecting dining, performances, and festivals.
